plot: Melinda and Eli try to reach ghosts who are angry that their bodies have been found in a lake, and Sam/Jim continues to struggle with his memories and a decision about Nikki.

Melinda lets "Sam's" fiancée Nicole stay with them for a week, so they can work out if they still have a future together. Eli James calls a marker to let Melinda work on the ghosts found in a lake by students during a nightly swim. Their motivation to stay on earth and resent any exposure proves a confusing cluster of guilt and care.—KGF Vissers
